text: San Marino competed in the Winter Olympic Games for the first time at the 1976 Winter Olympics in Innsbruck, Austria. ==Alpine skiing== ;Men {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Race 1 !colspan="2"|Race 2 !colspan="2"|Total |- !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |Giorgio Cecchetti |rowspan="2"|Giant Slalom |align="center"|2:37.15 |align="center"|82 |align="center"|2:41.02 |align="center"|51 |align="center"|5:18.17 |align="center"|51 |- |Maurizio Battistini |align="center"|2:33.33 |align="center"|81 |align="center"|DNF |align="center"|- |align="center"|DNF |align="center"|- |- |Maurizio Battistini |Slalom |align="center"|DNF |align="center"|- |align="center"|- |align="center"|- |align="center"|DNF |align="center"|- |} ==References== *Official Olympic Reports * Olympic Winter Games 1976, full results by sports-reference.com Category:Nations at the 1976 Winter Olympics 1976 Winter Olympics Winter Olympics
title: San Marino at the 1976 Winter Olympics
